title: Ticket #5788: wildcards not working correctly with encrypt_input_files ?
description:
I received a report that setting "encrypt_input_files = *" does not work for some reason, and that as a workaround they have had to specify "*.tar.gz" and/or use a dummy file at the end of the list.

Investigate the issue and fix code as necessary. Update this ticket with a full description of the problem once it is understood.
creator: zmiller
